resources.string:
More Info : This extension is a tool designed to help you focus on the top youtube and video SEO ranking factors pulled from several reputable industry reports and top SEO experts. For a more in depth explanation, see the Step By Step YouTube SEO Checklist 2019 Version blog post which has info for each step and one paragraph description of each point. I refer to the “blog post” within the checklist several times where i recommend free tools or a tutorial that helps or explains some steps of this checklist. These are SEO and traffic strategies designed to help you drive more traffic through your videos.
 You can check your optimization score and see it improve with each task that you complete from the automated scorer at the bottom of the extension 
 
 Recommended YouTube SEO Software : You Can Automate Your YouTube Video, Channel and Playlist Optimization Using The Following Tools Which All Have Built In Strategies Made Checkbox Simple! 
 Tubekit Alpha (Video and Channel Optimization Software)
 Video Synd Alpha (Video Distribution Software)
 Vid Attack Alpha (Increase User Behaviour Signals: CTR From SERPS and Retention)
 Vid Curate Alpha (Powerful YouTube Playlist Ranking and Social Video Curation Tools)
 Multi-Feed RSS Plugin (Create Playlists From Channel, Videos, Playlists With RSS Syndication)
